data.description: A Software Engineer intern will partner with our Retail Tech team to modernize the application utilized to track and manage Retail Home Consultant awards. What You’ll Do (Primary Responsibilities)Assist in modernizing or building a new applicationCollaborate with stakeholders and engineers to define and implement core featuresCoordinate creation of new reports in partnership with DEAG as neededDocument processes and progress in JIRASupport obsolescence of previous application if necessary Qualifications:• Currently enrolled as a junior is a Bachelor's degree program in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field•  Familiarity with application development concepts and lifecycle. Desired Skills:• Exposure to reporting tools (e.g., Tableau) and data visualization.• Cloud development familiarity• Ability to communicate blockers and concerns to the team and proactively solicit guidance for more complex problems.• Self-motivated and eager to learn; rapidly improve and apply what you have learned.  Why Clayton:Holidays (Memorial Day and Independence Day)On-site restaurant and work out facilityAt Clayton, we encourage holistic wellness with physical, nutritional, social, financial, spiritual and occupational programs*This Summer Internship role will focus upon and require completion of a project for presentation to our technology leadership. This intern must report to our Maryville, TN office. Interns will receive hands on training and experience to better understand our corporate atmosphere. The purpose is to bridge the gap between the academic setting and a future work environment.  Why Clayton?Clayton is a leading single-family, values-driven home builder dedicated to attainable housing, sustainable practices and creating a world-class experience for customers and team members. Quarterly profit share bonus program. Onsite gym with variety of classes, wellness, professional and personal development programs and much more! Clayton is committed to creating an inclusive workplace. Clayton is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age, or other legally protected status.Business Unit - B00023Technology
responsibilities: Collaborate with stakeholders and engineers to define and implement core features
